Author: aswerefallingdown
Text: :( hope you feel better. I have an emotionally (and sometimes physically) abusive mom too. It sucks. Nothing's ever her fault and everything's always my fault so you have no choice but to keep everything in. And she wonders why I'm so screwed up.  I hope you can someday beat this disorder one day once and for all, so that you can shove it in her face that no matter how much she ruins your life, you are still better than her!
